actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-546.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Failed of Passage in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 187 - 220 (Record Vote No: 89).

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 4515) making urgent supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1986, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 4515 (supplemental appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 4515) making urgent supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1986, and for other purposes.
